subtitle: Share of Mobile Phone Website Traffic Worldwide <br class="mobile-hide"/>(2009-2018)
alt: Share of Mobile Phone Website Traffic Worldwide (2009-2018)
description:
Mobile website traffic has risen again and now accounts for half of all global web pages served. Our websites are mobile-ready, responsive, and have Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) enabled for the fastest experience on mobile.

Source: Statista
